backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with product, vendor, order, user profile types and maps, plus authorization and profile endpoints.
feature_evidence.json: Structured feature evidence report listing feature IDs, titles, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like summary mapping frontend file paths to short descriptions of their UI behavior and styling.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Documents fixes for frontend production build issues involving environment variables, Vite setup, and TypeScript config.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base theme and CSS variable definitions for light/dark color systems and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document loading the Vite React app with manifest and mobile app meta tags.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, colors, and display mode.
frontend/public/offline.html: Standalone offline fallback page with gradient styling and retry button.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing precaching, cache cleanup, and network-first or cache-first fetch strategies with offline fallback.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main router with all public, customer, vendor, and admin routes wrapped in AppLayout and role-based access components.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminError: React error boundary for admin pages that catches render errors and shows a fallback UI with refresh and home navigation.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Provides a page layout with top navigation, bottom navigation, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access-denied UI with optional admin role assignment, access refresh logic, and detailed actor initialization errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button that uses Internet Identity and handles auth flow, including clearing cache and retrying login on errors.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter basic details and save them via backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireRole: Role‑based access wrapper that validates user role, handles actor errors, logs denials, and shows loading or AccessDeniedScreen as needed.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Renders a mobile bottom navigation bar with role‑based links and cart badge.
frontend/src/components/buttons/PrimaryC: Wrapper around Button applying primary CTA gradient styling.
frontend/src/components/DealCard.tsx: Displays a product deal card with image, pricing, discount, and deal type badge linking to the product page.
frontend/src/components/forms/FloatingLa: Input component with animated floating label styling using peer-based transitions.
frontend/src/components/HeroBannerSlider: Implements an auto‑rotating image banner slider with manual navigation controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductGrid.tsx: Renders a responsive product grid with images, pricing, stock badges, loading skeletons, and add‑to‑cart handling.
frontend/src/components/status/OrderStat: Badge displaying order status with dynamic class names and text based on status utilities.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Provides the top navigation bar with search, role‑based actions, cart count, and mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/data/vendors.ts: Static list of vendor metadata including id, shop name, location, and mobile number.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous actor, initializes access control, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorQueryState.ts: Hook that passively reads actor query state from React Query cache to detect initialization status or errors without recreating the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing identity loading, login, logout, and status flags. Wraps AuthClient creation with custom options and exposes helper hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, roles, products, and other backend data, integrating actor-based calls and Internet Identity when needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines a full light/dark OKLCH color system with utility classes for shadows and gradients.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with mission details and feature cards using styled UI components.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Displays admin analytics including totals and a bar chart overview using fetched analytics data.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminOrdersPage: Displays all orders for admins with status controls and updates order status via mutation.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminProductsPa: Admin page for listing, adding, editing, and deleting products with a product form dialog.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminVendorsPag: Allows admins to view, add, and remove vendors using dialogs and actor calls.
frontend/src/pages/CartPage.tsx: Displays the shopping cart, handles quantity updates, removals, and checkout routing, integrating product data and authentication.
frontend/src/pages/CategoriesPage.tsx: Shows a grid of product categories with loading skeletons and colorful icons linking to category detail pages.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryListingPage.t: Displays products filtered by category with sorting options and renders a product grid or an empty state.
frontend/src/pages/CheckoutPage.tsx: Builds an order summary from cart items, calculates totals, and submits an order before clearing the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Provides a contact form with basic validation and simulated submission along with static contact info cards.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerProf: Shows the logged‑in customer's profile details, principal, and account role in a read‑only form.
frontend/src/pages/customer/OrdersPage.t: Displays the customer's past orders with status badges and basic order info.
frontend/src/pages/customer/WishlistPage: Shows products saved to the customer’s wishlist with loading states, product cards, and availability info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with hero slider, login buttons, deal products, and feature highlights.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/CustomerLo: Customer login form collecting personal and location details with validation and navigation to vendor list.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/OutletDeta: Outlet details form for vendors with photo upload, validation, and saving data before navigating to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/SimpleVend: Displays vendor and outlet information after successful registration, including location, contact, and uploaded photo.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorList: Shows vendors filtered by city with navigation to individual vendor shop pages and handling for missing or empty results.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorLogi: Vendor login form collecting personal and location info with validation and navigation to outlet details.
frontend/src/pages/onboarding/VendorShop: Displays detailed information for a selected vendor shop with location and contact details, handling missing vendor cases.
frontend/src/pages/ProductPage.tsx: Loads and displays detailed product info including images, pricing, reviews, and allows adding to cart or submitting reviews.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorDashboar: Vendor dashboard showing wallet dues, sales stats, outlet status, and a payment action using vendor data queries.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorOrdersPa: Displays a vendor's orders with status badges, timestamps, and basic order details.
frontend/src/pages/vendor/VendorProducts: Product management page letting vendors add, edit, and delete products with a dialog form and category support.
frontend/src/utils/categoryColors.ts: Provides deterministic gradient background classes for categories based on a hash of the category ID.
frontend/src/utils/categoryMatch.ts: Utility to find a category by case‑insensitive name matching.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Extracts readable error messages and formats them for diagnostics, handling traps and rejected calls.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers or bigints into INR currency strings with the ₹ prefix.
frontend/src/utils/onboardingStorage.ts: Stores and retrieves onboarding data for customers, vendors, and outlets in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/statusStyles.ts: Maps order and UI statuses to classNames and provides stock availability styling helpers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities to read, persist, and clear URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback, supporting hash routing.
frontend/src/vite-env.d.ts: Vite environment type declarations including optional II URL config.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, custom OKLCH color tokens, extended radii, shadows, animations, and includes typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, features, generated assets, and known issues for an ICP-based marketplace app with RBAC and PWA support.
